content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's nice to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student, so I'm looking for a good deal. What's the lowest price you can offer?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best living experience for my tenants. However, I also need to ensure that I'm compensated fairly for the investment I've made in this property. So, I can't really offer you a discount. The price for this apartment is 1200 Euros per month. Do you think this is a fair price considering the location and the amenities provided?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1200 Euros per month is quite high for a student like me. Is there any flexibility in the price? I'm looking for something more affordable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that as a student, you might be on a tight budget. However, the price of 1200 Euros per month is very competitive for a newly built, unfurnished apartment in the city center. The location alone is a major selling point, with easy access to public transportation and all the amenities you need nearby. Is there anything specific you're looking for in the price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the quality of the apartment and the location is perfect for me. However, my budget is limited as a student. I'm looking for something around 800-900 Euros per month. Is there any way we can work towards that price range?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot go as low as 800-900 Euros per month. The cost of living in the city center is quite high, and I need to cover my expenses, including the mortgage, maintenance, and taxes. If you're willing to pay 1000 Euros per month, I might be able to consider it. This would still be a good deal for you, considering the quality of the apartment and the amenities. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1000 Euros per month is more within my budget. However, I would still appreciate if we could negotiate a bit lower, say around 950 Euros per month. This would make the apartment more feasible for me. Can we discuss further about the price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm willing to negotiate, but I must stress that 950 Euros per month is very close to my bottom line. If you can pay 950 Euros per month, I would be willing to enter into a long-term lease with you, say for two years, to lock in this price. This would provide me with some financial stability, and in return, you would get a great apartment at a fair price. What do you think about this proposal?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that we can negotiate. Your proposal for a two-year lease at 950 Euros per month is an interesting one. I would need some time to consider it. Can we take a break for now and continue our discussion later?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Farhad. I understand that it's a big decision, and you need time to think it over. We can take a break and come back to the negotiation later. If you have any questions or need more time, feel free to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will get back to you soon with my decision.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: No problem, Farhad. I look forward to your response. If you need more information or would like to view the apartment again, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I've considered your offer, and I'm willing to accept the price of 950 Euros per month with a two-year lease. I agree to the price of 950 Euros!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent news, Farhad! I'm glad to hear that you're willing to accept the price of 950 Euros per month with a two-year lease. This is a great deal for both of us, as you get a high-quality apartment in the city center at a fair price, and I have the security of a long-term tenant. Let's proceed with the lease agreement. I'll send you the lease contract within the next few days. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I think we've covered everything. I'm looking forward to signing the lease and moving into the apartment. Thank you for your time and for offering me such a good deal.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Farhad. I'm glad we could reach an agreement that suits both of us. Once you receive the lease contract, please review it carefully and let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything you would like to change. After you sign the contract and return it to me, we can arrange a date for you to move in. I'm sure you'll be very happy in your new home. Thank you again for choosing my apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
